dispatcher_instrumentation.rb

Path: vendor/plugins/newrelic_rpm/lib/new_relic/agent/instrumentation/dispatcher_instrumentation.rb
Last Update: Thu Sep 03 18:46:33 -0400 2009

We have to patch the mongrel dispatcher live since the classes aren‘t defined when our instrumentation loads To use this module, you need to monkey patch a method newrelic_response_code which will return the response status code when the dispatcher finishes.

[Validate]
